title.narrative: Promoting rights, Protecting Women: Prevention of & Response to GBV against Women and Girls in Mogadishu

description.narrative: Alert will work as a sub-contractor to CISP to implement this project in Mogadishu, Somalia, which seeks to improve the prevention of and response to gender based violence in three districts of Mogadishu through a multi-faceted response which includes capacity building, support to service provision, awareness activities and advocacy. Alert's role focuses on research on GBV and training of project staff and partners in conflict sensitivity.
Promoting rights, Protecting Women: Prevention of & Response to GBV against Women and Girls in Mogadishu
